title: Where Can I Learn More About Storybook
content: Where can I learn more about Storybook? - The Design System Guide Close Storybook # Where can I learn more about Storybook? Romina Kavcic Official Storybook Tutorial The official Storybook website offers a comprehensive "Intro to Storybook" tutorial that covers the essentials Setting up Storybook in your development environment Building simple and composite components Working with data Constructing screens Deploying Storybook Visual testing Using addons The official tutorial is available for multiple frameworks including React, Vue, Angular, and more üîó Read the guides [https://storybook.js.org/tutorials/] üîó Storybook Docs [https://storybook.js.org/docs] Getting Started with Storybook: The Ultimate Tool for Component Documentation and Testing üëâ Chapters 0:00 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMNAehI0_cI&t=0s] Introduction 00:50 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMNAehI0_cI&t=50s] Setting Up Storybook 01:14 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMNAehI0_cI&t=74s] Exploring Storybook 01:36 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMNAehI0_cI&t=96s] The Purpose of Storybook 01:54 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMNAehI0_cI&t=114s] Storybook File Structure 04:02 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMNAehI0_cI&t=242s] Metadata and Grouping 04:41 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMNAehI0_cI&t=281s] Creating a Story 05:23 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMNAehI0_cI&t=323s] Styling the Footer Component 08:32 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMNAehI0_cI&t=512s] Storybook Features 09:19 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMNAehI0_cI&t=559s] Controls and Actions 09:44 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMNAehI0_cI&t=584s] Accessibility Testing üìπ Watch the video [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMNAehI0_cI] Design Systems for Developers üîó Read the guide [https://storybook.js.org/tutorials/design-systems-for-developers/] 6 Storybook Tutorials for Product Development Teams üîó Read the guides [https://www.uxpin.com/studio/blog/storybook-tutorial/] Next question How can I create a Personal Access Token on GitHub? I coach design teams on implementing design systems, optimizing design processes, and developing design strategy. I'm Romina Kavcic.
